Cross-cutting: Action registry lists all 18 actions with correct metadata and versions
Cross-cutting: All action input/output schemas validate and render in the designer without runtime errors
Cross-cutting: Standard error codes are consistent across all actions
Cross-cutting: Audit events include tenant, run id, action id/version, and target resource IDs for every mutating action
Cross-cutting: Secrets referenced by actions are never logged and are redacted in run views
Cross-cutting: Under load (parallel workflow runs), system remains within DB pool limits (no KnexTimeoutError)
Cross-cutting: Action outputs are typed and visible in mapping UI and expression autocomplete
Cross-cutting: Documentation/examples appear in the designer help for each action
